title: Florida Blocks Justice Department Monitors From Entering Polling Places
description: The secretary, Cord Byrd, joined Republican officials in Missouri in rejecting a Justice Department request to safeguard federal voting laws.
dc:creator: Patricia Mazzei and Glenn Thrush
media:credit: Zack Wittman for The New York Times
media:description: Residents line up to vote in downtown St. Petersburg, Fla.
